row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# = ''
! Check the input params
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_URL# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# = '-U &UC4RB_AWS_URL# ' :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_REGION# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS#, '--region &UC4RB_AWS_REGION# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_TOKEN# <> "" : IF &UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_TOKEN# <> "--10" : SET &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS#, '--security-token &UC4RB_AWS_SECURITY_TOKEN# ') : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_CONN_TIMEOUT# = "" : SET &UC4RB_AWS_CONN_TIMEOUT# = 30 : SET &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS#, '--connection-timeout &UC4RB_AWS_CONN_TIMEOUT# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_REQ_TIMEOUT# = "" : SET &UC4RB_AWS_REQ_TIMEOUT# = 45 : SET &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS#, '--request-timeout &UC4RB_AWS_REQ_TIMEOUT# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_ACCESS_KEY# <> "" OR "--10" : SET &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS#, '-O &UC4RB_AWS_ACCESS_KEY# ') :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_AWS_SECRET_KEY# <> "" OR "--10" : SET &UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AWS_COMMON_OPTIONS#, '-W &UC4RB_AWS_SECRET_KEY# ') :ENDIF
